conbody.p: The com.miramo.mmpdf plugin includes the following files and folders, located in the DITA-OT installation folder selected during installation:
Source for the com.miramo.mmpdf DITA-OT plugin:

dd.p: XSL stylesheet placeholders and language specific localization strings. Do not change the contents of this folder - refer to for information on generating a custom plugin based on com.miramo.mmpdf, and setting the mmpdf:localization-strings.dir ant build parameter.
Contains source files for making a specialization of the com.miramo.mmpdf plugin. Refer to for more details on creating a custom plugin.
Images used by the com.miramo.mmpdf plugin

The transformation scenarios for producing a PDF from the currently edited DITA file. Import into your tool using Options
Import Transformation Scenarios
Files needed for integrating with XMetaL.
Images and logos used by the com.miramo.mmpdf plugin
default.mfd: default template for DITA publishing 'out of the box'.
A modified version of the DITA-OT taskbook (IT book) sample
XSL stylesheets for mapping the merged DITA content to MiramoXML
Command script for preprocessing a DITA input file to MiramoXML, ready for rendering to PDF. Called by:
Command script for running the flowers demo, or for producing a PDF from a specified DITA map.

XML file which contains the ant targets for performing topicmerge and translating the DITA content to MiramoXML (Miramo Simple Markup, which represents the document content), and for rendering that document content to PDF using the format definitions in the MFD template.
